Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdrenalineCLI, AdrenalineGUI
    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
    View class of the MVC paradigm. It's abstract because several methods will be either overridden or implemented in its children classes.
    Author:
    Daniele Chiappalupi, Stefano Formicola, Elena Iannucci

      • timeoutHasExpired

        public abstract void timeoutHasExpired()
        Called by the client when the timeout expires and the user is kicked out.

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Method implemented by subclasses when a new game starts. This super method should be called in order to set View's gameID attribute.

      • willChooseConnection

        protected abstract void willChooseConnection()
        Public method implemented by subclasses when starting a new application instance. The user will be prompted to choose the connection parameters.

      • didChooseConnection

        public void didChooseConnection​(ConnectionType type,
                                int port,
                                java.lang.String host)
        Method called after a user choice of the connection. Shouldn't be reimplemented by a subclass.

      • willCreateUser

        protected abstract void willCreateUser()
        Abstract method implemented by subclasses and used to ask for username to clients

        Parameters:

      • didChooseSpawnPoint

        protected void didChooseSpawnPoint​(java.lang.String powerupChosenAsSpawnPoint,
                                   java.lang.String otherPowerup)
        Public method implemented by subclasses when choosing a weapon.
        Parameters:
        powerupChosenAsSpawnPoint - it's the powerup that has been chosen from the player: it will be discarded and used to let him spawn.
        otherPowerup - it's the other powerup: it will be added to the hand of the player.

        Public method implemented by subclasses when choosing the damages to make.
        Parameters:
        damagesToChoose - it's a map containing all of the possible damages that can be made and the weapon used to make them.

        public abstract void onPowerupInHandFailure()
        Public method implemented by subclasses and called when a player has selected to use powerups but hasn't got any of them.

        public abstract void willChoosePowerupSelling​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> powerups)
        Public method implemented by subclasses when choosing if using a powerup to get its ammo or not.
        Parameters:
        powerups - it's a map containing the powerups that the player has in his hand and the next thing to do after the powerups choosing.

      • didChoosePowerupSelling

        protected void didChoosePowerupSelling​(java.lang.String weapon,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> powerup)
        Called when the player has decided if he wants to use any powerup to afford the cost of the weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - it's the weapon that is being used.
        powerup - it's a list containing the powerups chosen by the player, empty if none has been chosen.

      • didChooseDamage

        protected void didChooseDamage​(java.lang.String weapon,
                               java.lang.String damage,
                               java.lang.String indexOfEffect,
                               java.lang.String forPotentiableWeapon)
        Called when the damages to be done have been chosen by the player.
        Parameters:
        weapon - it's the weapon that is being used.
        damage - it's the damage that has been selected.
        indexOfEffect - it's the index of the effect that is being used.
        forPotentiableWeapon - it's the string containing the information about potentiable weapons.

      • willChooseMode

        public abstract void willChooseMode​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> modalitiesToChoose)
        Public method implemented by subclasses when choosing which modality of a selectable weapon does the player want to use.
        Parameters:
        modalitiesToChoose - it's a map containing the modalities to choose and the weapon that is being used.

        effect - it's the effect that has been chosen.

        Public method implemented by subclasses when the player has to decide what weapon does he want to reload.
        Parameters:

      • willChoosePowerupDamage

        public abstract void willChoosePowerupDamage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> possibleDamages)
        Public method implemented by subclasses, called when the player has to decide what damage does he want to do with the powerup he is using.
        Parameters:
        possibleDamages - it's a map containing both the possible damages and the powerup used to do them.

      • didChoosePowerupDamage

        protected void didChoosePowerupDamage​(java.lang.String choice,
                                      java.lang.String powerup)
        Called when the damage to be done with the powerup has been chosen from the player.
        Parameters:
        choice - it's the damage chosen by the player.
        powerup - it's the Powerup::toString of the powerup that has been chosen.

      • displayChange

        public abstract void displayChange​(java.lang.String change)
        Called whenever any other player finishes an action.
        Parameters:
        change - it's the updated Board::toStringFromPlayer

      • willSpawnAfterDeath

        public abstract void willSpawnAfterDeath​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> powerupsToSpawn)
        Called whenever a player has to spawn after its death.
        Parameters:
        powerupsToSpawn - it's the list of powerups that can be used to respawn.

      • didChooseSpawnAfterDeath

        protected void didChooseSpawnAfterDeath​(java.lang.String powerupChosen)
        Called when a player has chosen where does he want to spawn.
        Parameters:
        powerupChosen - it's the powerup that has been chosen.

      • displayFinalFrenzy

        public abstract void displayFinalFrenzy()
        Displays that the final frenzy mode has arrived.

      • endOfTheGame

        public abstract void endOfTheGame​(java.lang.String scoreboard)
        Displays the final scoreboard of the game.
        Parameters:
        scoreboard - it's a string containing the leader board.

      • moveBeforeShot

        public abstract void moveBeforeShot​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> movements)

      • didChooseMovementBeforeShot

        protected void didChooseMovementBeforeShot​(java.lang.String movement)

      • tagback

        public abstract void tagback​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availablePowerup,
                             java.lang.String nickname)

      • didChooseTagback

        protected void didChooseTagback​(java.lang.String choice)

      • didNotUseTagback
